```{zsh, engine.opts='-l'}
source ~/.zshrc
conda activate $CONDA_ENV
# Downloads all data from specified directory
kaggle kernels output $KAGGLE_REPO -p 4.data_analysis/sentiment_analysis/data/chunks

mv 4.data_analysis/sentiment_analysis/data/chunks/output/* 4.data_analysis/sentiment_analysis/data/chunks

rm -r 4.data_analysis/sentiment_analysis/data/chunks/output/
  
rm 4.data_analysis/sentiment_analysis/data/chunks/*.log

```
